## getMultiFactorResolver() function

Provides a [MultiFactorResolver](./auth.multifactorresolver.md) suitable for completion of a multi-factor flow.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getMultiFactorResolver(auth: Auth, error: MultiFactorError): MultiFactorResolver;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  auth | [Auth](./auth.auth.md) | The auth instance. |
|  error | [MultiFactorError](./auth.multifactorerror.md) | The [MultiFactorError](./auth.multifactorerror.md) raised during a sign-in, or reauthentication operation. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[MultiFactorResolver](./auth.multifactorresolver.md)
